title: Silicone Kitchen Tongs Set of 3-7/ 9/12 inches, Stainless Steel with Non-Stick Silicone Tips for Cooking, Barbecue, BBQ Grilling, Buffet Serving Heat Resistant(Orange)
features: Quality Silicone and Stainless Steel: The kitchen tongs are made of premium stainless steel for unbeatable strength and premium construction, while remaining lightweight and easy to handle! And food grade silicone Durable, and heat resistant.

Non-stick Heat Resistant: BPA-free silicone tip that won't scratch your non-stick pans or grill grates. The non-stick silicone heads are heat resistant up to 480°F perfect for turning large cuts of meat while barbecuing!.
Easy to clean and store: A ring pull locking mechanism which made it easily hung up for air-dry and closed for storage. and simply wipe under hot water or throw in the dishwasher.
Multiple Usage: Works well for turning and lifting cheese, fish, shrimp, crab, chicken, turkey, pizza, asparagus, vegetable salad, pasta, ice block, escargot, pastry, cake, and taco etc.

Ergonomically Designed: Ergonomic Handle Non-slip, heat-resistant, and firm grips for easy control while cooking or serving food . The set of 3 sizes - Small 7", Medium 9", Large 12" is perfect for all your needs, and can also be used as ice tongs or sugar tongs.
description: 7” small kitchen tong x 1  9” standard kitchen tong x 1   12” large kitchen tong x 1
Great for taking vegetable, food, meat, cheese, bread, ice and more, lightweight and convenient, easy to carry at any place, great for various outdoor activities.

1. Please wash the tongs with warm dishwashing detergent water before first using in order to wash off any residue left from the manufacturing process; 2. Please clean and air dry the silicone tongs after using for your healthy daily use, and store them in dry place for its durability; 3. You can use it in various ways, Great for taking food, vegetables, noodles, meat, cheeses, bread, ice cubes and more etc.
